definitions.definition: to move into or through something:
examples: Amazingly, the bullet did not penetrate his brain.

definitions.definition: to succeed in becoming part of an organization, etc. and working within it :
examples: The organization had been penetrated by a spy.
These changes had not yet penetrated as far west as the mountains of Merioneth.

definitions.definition: If your eyes penetrate somewhere dark, you manage to see through it:
examples: Our eyes couldn't penetrate the dark/the gloom of the inner cave.

definitions.definition: When a man penetrates his partner during sex, he puts his penis into his or her body.
